product_name: The North Face Denali Thermal Jacket - Women's
long_description: An iconic style bolstered with Polartec(R) Thermal Pro(R) fleece, The North Face Denali Thermal jacket for women feels luxurious and is wind resistant so you stay cozy. High-loft polyester fleece is exceptionally soft and warm and offers an outstanding warmth-to-weight ratio. Polyester reinforcements on the shoulders and chest resist abrasion from pack straps and provide extra weather resistance. Drawcord hem and elastic-bound cuffs help seal in warmth. The North Face Denali Thermal jacket for women features zippered hand pockets, a Napoleon chest pocket and a media pocket. Integration feature lets you zip jacket into compatible shells and parkas from The North Face.
short_description: An iconic style bolstered with Polartec(R) Thermal Pro(R) fleece, The North Face Denali Thermal jacket for women feels luxurious and is wind resistant so you stay cozy.
